channel.title: Mali on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Mali on FinanClub

item.title: BTG
item.description: score:146 Chances: Mali’s industrial gold output is expected to drop by about 14% this year, which may affect B2Gold Corp’s operations in the region. Gold prices have surged recently and are trading at near all-time highs, presenting a positive opportunity for B2Gold Corp.
